analysis.key_quote: I strongly oppose the proposed rule OPM-2025-0004-0001. This rule would reclassify over 50,000 federal employees into an at-will status, removing essential civil service protections.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the removal of civil service protections and the potential for politically motivated terminations, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and due process.
